languages.text: "Можно ли сказать, что сегодня свершилось правосудие, если в процессе мы взорвали суд и свергли судей?"
"Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"
languages.original_text: "Можно ли сказать, что сегодня свершилось правосудие, если в процессе мы взорвали суд и свергли судей?"

traits.locale_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and killed the judge in the process?"
"Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and killed the judge in the process?"
"Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and killed the judge in the process?"
"Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"
"Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

languages.text: 「もし裁判所を爆破し、その過程で裁判官を倒したとしたら、今日、正義が行われたと言えるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: 「もし裁判所を爆破し、その過程で裁判官を殺したとしたら、今日、正義が行われたと言えるだろうか？」

languages.text: "Können wir sagen, dass heute Gerechtigkeit geübt wurde, wenn wir das Gericht in die Luft gejagt und dabei den Richter gestürzt hätten?"
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: "Können wir sagen, dass heute Gerechtigkeit geübt wurde, wenn wir das Gericht in die Luft gejagt und dabei den Richter gestürzt hätten?"

languages.text: « Peut-on estimer que justice a été rendue, maintenant que nous avons fait sauter le palais de justice et démis le juge de ses fonctions par la même occasion ? »
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: « Peut-on estimer que justice a été rendue, maintenant que nous avons fait sauter le palais de justice et démis le juge de ses fonctions par la même occasion ? »

languages.text: «¿Podríamos afirmar que se ha hecho justicia si volásemos el juzgado por los aires, derrocando al juez durante el proceso?».
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Podríamos afirmar que se ha hecho justicia si volásemos el juzgado por los aires, derrocando al juez durante el proceso?».

languages.text: “我们炸掉了法庭，还顺便推翻了判决，这可以说是正义得到了伸张吗？”
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: “我们炸掉了法庭，还顺便推翻了判决，这可以说是正义得到了伸张吗？”

languages.text: "Mahkemeyi havaya uçurup yargıcı devirdiğiniz bugünü, gerçekten adalet yerini buldu diye anabilir miyiz?"
languages.original_text: "Can we say that justice was done today if we blew up the court and overthrew the judge in the process?"

traits.locale_text: "Mahkemeyi havaya uçurup yargıcı devirdiğiniz bugünü, gerçekten adalet yerini buldu diye anabilir miyiz?"
